name: WinDynamicDesktop Theme
summary: A DDW file is a theme used by WinDynamicDesktop, an app that changes your desktop wallpaper based on the time of day at your location. It is a Zip-compressed archive that contains desktop wallpaper .JPG images, and a .JSON file storing theme metadata . WinDynamicDesktop users load DDW files in the software to display images on their desktop at different times throughout the day (e.g., sunrise, day, sunset, and night).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
